text:
Created attachment 28628
patch file for test org.apache.catalina.authenticator.TestDigestAuthenticator

verify bug 52954 (broken android HTTP DIGEST) is fixed and also some fairly trivial changes to test other edge cases.
creator: Brian@PingToo.com

text: At least one of the additional test cases is invalid. It is testing a problem that does not exist. See http://tomcat.markmail.org/thread/cp6t3uveslg6xecq
creator: markt@apache.org
